meta_info: ::id NW_AFP_ENG_0024_2006_0217.1 ::date 2017-11-03T13:37:45 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt 200 dead, 1,500 feared missing in Philippines landslide # ::save-date Fri Nov 3, 2017 ::file NW_AFP_ENG_0024_2006_0217_1.txt
sentence: 200 dead, 1,500 feared missing in Philippines landslide

meta_info: ::id NW_AFP_ENG_0024_2006_0217.2 ::date 2017-11-03T13:44:59 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt TACLOBAN, Philippines, Feb 17, 2006 # ::save-date Fri Nov 3, 2017 ::file NW_AFP_ENG_0024_2006_0217_2.txt
sentence: TACLOBAN, Philippines, Feb 17, 2006

meta_info: ::id NW_AFP_ENG_0024_2006_0217.3 ::date 2017-11-03T13:49:52 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt About 200 people were believed killed and 1,500 others were missing in the central Philippines on Friday when a landslide buried an entire village, the Red Cross said. # ::save-date Fri Nov 3, 2017 ::file NW_AFP_ENG_0024_2006_0217_3.txt
sentence: About 200 people were believed killed and 1,500 others were missing in the central Philippines on Friday when a landslide buried an entire village, the Red Cross said.

meta_info: ::id NW_AFP_ENG_0024_2006_0217.4 ::date 2017-11-03T14:05:09 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt Eyewitnesses said only a few houses were left standing after the landslide hit the village of Guinsaugon in the south of the Philippine island of Leyte. # ::save-date Fri Nov 3, 2017 ::file NW_AFP_ENG_0024_2006_0217_4.txt
sentence: Eyewitnesses said only a few houses were left standing after the landslide hit the village of Guinsaugon in the south of the Philippine island of Leyte.

meta_info: ::id NW_AFP_ENG_0024_2006_0217.5 ::date 2017-11-03T14:24:44 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt "There are about 1,500 missing, 200 dead," Richard Gordon, the head of the Philippine Red Cross, said in a radio interview. # ::save-date Sun Nov 19, 2017 ::file NW_AFP_ENG_0024_2006_0217_5.txt
sentence: "There are about 1,500 missing, 200 dead," Richard Gordon, the head of the Philippine Red Cross, said in a radio interview.

meta_info: ::id NW_AFP_ENG_0024_2006_0217.6 ::date 2017-11-03T14:40:02 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt The first footage from the devastated village showed a sea of mud covering what had been lush green valley farmland. # ::save-date Fri Nov 3, 2017 ::file NW_AFP_ENG_0024_2006_0217_6.txt
sentence: The first footage from the devastated village showed a sea of mud covering what had been lush green valley farmland.

meta_info: ::id NW_AFP_ENG_0024_2006_0217.7 ::date 2017-11-03T15:09:49 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt Only a few sheets of tin roofing and the occasional coconut tree could be seen. # ::save-date Fri Nov 3, 2017 ::file NW_AFP_ENG_0024_2006_0217_7.txt
sentence: Only a few sheets of tin roofing and the occasional coconut tree could be seen.

meta_info: ::id NW_AFP_ENG_0024_2006_0217.8 ::date 2017-11-03T15:14:30 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt Tiny groups of mud-spattered survivors were also shown, walking through the muck, apparently stunned by the scope of the destruction. # ::save-date Fri Nov 3, 2017 ::file NW_AFP_ENG_0024_2006_0217_8.txt
sentence: Tiny groups of mud-spattered survivors were also shown, walking through the muck, apparently stunned by the scope of the destruction.

meta_info: ::id NW_AFP_ENG_0024_2006_0217.9 ::date 2017-11-03T16:20:01 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt In a televised address to the nation, President Gloria Arroyo said rescue teams were rushing to the area from "air, land and sea" to cope with the catastrophe. # ::save-date Sun Nov 19, 2017 ::file NW_AFP_ENG_0024_2006_0217_9.txt
sentence: In a televised address to the nation, President Gloria Arroyo said rescue teams were rushing to the area from "air, land and sea" to cope with the catastrophe.

meta_info: ::id NW_AFP_ENG_0024_2006_0217.10 ::date 2017-11-03T18:09:21 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt "I have ordered the Coast Guard and our entire naval force in the (central Philippines) region to the area," she said. # ::save-date Wed Jan 17, 2018 ::file NW_AFP_ENG_0024_2006_0217_10.txt
sentence: "I have ordered the Coast Guard and our entire naval force in the (central Philippines) region to the area," she said.

meta_info: ::id NW_AFP_ENG_0024_2006_0217.11 ::date 2017-11-03T18:21:31 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt "Naval ships will be used as floating hospitals and command centres for relief and rescue." # ::save-date Tue Jan 16, 2018 ::file NW_AFP_ENG_0024_2006_0217_11.txt
sentence: "Naval ships will be used as floating hospitals and command centres for relief and rescue."

meta_info: ::id NW_AFP_ENG_0024_2006_0217.12 ::date 2017-11-03T18:26:45 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt Leyte Governor Rosette Lerias said the latest census indicated there were 375 houses with 3,000 people living in Guinsaugon before the landslide. # ::save-date Tue Dec 19, 2017 ::file NW_AFP_ENG_0024_2006_0217_12.txt
sentence: Leyte Governor Rosette Lerias said the latest census indicated there were 375 houses with 3,000 people living in Guinsaugon before the landslide.

meta_info: ::id NW_AFP_ENG_0024_2006_0217.13 ::date 2017-11-03T22:41:41 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt She described the village as totally flattened. # ::save-date Fri Nov 3, 2017 ::file NW_AFP_ENG_0024_2006_0217_13.txt
sentence: She described the village as totally flattened.

meta_info: ::id NW_AFP_ENG_0024_2006_0217.14 ::date 2017-11-03T23:08:38 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt "It was like mud running down the mountain and it covered the village in seconds," she said, quoting survivors. # ::save-date Fri Nov 3, 2017 ::file NW_AFP_ENG_0024_2006_0217_14.txt
sentence: "It was like mud running down the mountain and it covered the village in seconds," she said, quoting survivors.

meta_info: ::id NW_AFP_ENG_0024_2006_0217.15 ::date 2017-11-03T23:21:56 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt Experts blamed deforestation for the tragedy, which came after days of rainfall that was five times higher than usual. # ::save-date Tue Dec 19, 2017 ::file NW_AFP_ENG_0024_2006_0217_15.txt
sentence: Experts blamed deforestation for the tragedy, which came after days of rainfall that was five times higher than usual.

meta_info: ::id NW_AFP_ENG_0024_2006_0217.16 ::date 2017-11-03T23:39:57 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt Lerias said that many Guinsaugon residents had been evacuated after landslides earlier in the week had killed more than 20 people on Leyte, but that many had returned Friday because the rains had stopped and the sun had come out. # ::save-date Thu Dec 14, 2017 ::file NW_AFP_ENG_0024_2006_0217_16.txt
sentence: Lerias said that many Guinsaugon residents had been evacuated after landslides earlier in the week had killed more than 20 people on Leyte, but that many had returned Friday because the rains had stopped and the sun had come out.

meta_info: ::id NW_AFP_ENG_0024_2006_0217.17 ::date 2017-11-03T23:40:15 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt A mild 2.6-magnitude earthquake which struck before the landslide may also have helped set off the wall of mud that crashed down on the village, said Rene Solidum, head of the government vulcanology office. # ::save-date Sun Jan 14, 2018 ::file NW_AFP_ENG_0024_2006_0217_17.txt
sentence: A mild 2.6-magnitude earthquake which struck before the landslide may also have helped set off the wall of mud that crashed down on the village, said Rene Solidum, head of the government vulcanology office.

meta_info: ::id NW_AFP_ENG_0024_2006_0217.18 ::date 2017-11-03T23:40:29 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt "The area could have really been ready for a landslide because of the amount of rainfall and if there was a minor earthquake, it might have hastened it," Solidum said. # ::save-date Sat Nov 4, 2017 ::file NW_AFP_ENG_0024_2006_0217_18.txt
sentence: "The area could have really been ready for a landslide because of the amount of rainfall and if there was a minor earthquake, it might have hastened it," Solidum said.

meta_info: ::id NW_AFP_ENG_0024_2006_0217.19 ::date 2017-11-04T00:06:58 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt Army Colonel Nestor Sadirin, head of a rescue task force, said 16 dead bodies had been recovered so far and 100 people rescued. # ::save-date Sat Nov 4, 2017 ::file NW_AFP_ENG_0024_2006_0217_19.txt
sentence: Army Colonel Nestor Sadirin, head of a rescue task force, said 16 dead bodies had been recovered so far and 100 people rescued.

meta_info: ::id NW_AFP_ENG_0024_2006_0217.20 ::date 2017-11-04T00:17:57 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt Leyte Congressman Roger Mercado said in a radio interview that the village had a population of 3,000 to 4,000 and expressed fears that as many as 2,000 people had been buried. # ::save-date Mon Jan 22, 2018 ::file NW_AFP_ENG_0024_2006_0217_20.txt
sentence: Leyte Congressman Roger Mercado said in a radio interview that the village had a population of 3,000 to 4,000 and expressed fears that as many as 2,000 people had been buried.

meta_info: ::id NW_AFP_ENG_0024_2006_0217.21 ::date 2017-11-04T00:26:08 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt Lerias called for more rescuers to come to the site to help look for bodies as heavy earth moving equipment could not work in the mud, which officials said was more than six metres (yards) deep in many areas. # ::save-date Tue Nov 21, 2017 ::file NW_AFP_ENG_0024_2006_0217_21.txt
sentence: Lerias called for more rescuers to come to the site to help look for bodies as heavy earth moving equipment could not work in the mud, which officials said was more than six metres (yards) deep in many areas.

meta_info: ::id NW_AFP_ENG_0024_2006_0217.22 ::date 2017-11-04T00:26:19 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt Volunteer rescue teams from the country's mining companies, skilled in digging through the earth to rescue people, were also going to the area, said President Arroyo said. # ::save-date Tue Nov 21, 2017 ::file NW_AFP_ENG_0024_2006_0217_22.txt
sentence: Volunteer rescue teams from the country's mining companies, skilled in digging through the earth to rescue people, were also going to the area, said President Arroyo said.

meta_info: ::id NW_AFP_ENG_0024_2006_0217.23 ::date 2017-11-04T00:38:39 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt Gordon said the Red Cross said was trying to dispatch sniffer dogs to hunt for survivors. # ::save-date Sat Nov 4, 2017 ::file NW_AFP_ENG_0024_2006_0217_23.txt
sentence: Gordon said the Red Cross said was trying to dispatch sniffer dogs to hunt for survivors.

meta_info: ::id NW_AFP_ENG_0024_2006_0217.24 ::date 2017-11-04T00:44:17 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt Military helicopters were able to reach the area despite heavy clouds but the flights ceased after nightfall because the aircraft did not have night-flying capabilities. # ::save-date Tue Jan 16, 2018 ::file NW_AFP_ENG_0024_2006_0217_24.txt
sentence: Military helicopters were able to reach the area despite heavy clouds but the flights ceased after nightfall because the aircraft did not have night-flying capabilities.

meta_info: ::id NW_AFP_ENG_0024_2006_0217.25 ::date 2017-11-04T00:56:12 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt Lerias said a smaller landslide later in the afternoon caused no damage but left many of the rescuers worried about a possible new disaster. # ::save-date Tue Dec 19, 2017 ::file NW_AFP_ENG_0024_2006_0217_25.txt
sentence: Lerias said a smaller landslide later in the afternoon caused no damage but left many of the rescuers worried about a possible new disaster.

meta_info: ::id NW_AFP_ENG_0024_2006_0217.26 ::date 2017-11-04T01:04:27 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt Relief groups called for drinking water, food, blankets and body bags to be brought to the scene. # ::save-date Tue Nov 21, 2017 ::file NW_AFP_ENG_0024_2006_0217_26.txt
sentence: Relief groups called for drinking water, food, blankets and body bags to be brought to the scene.

meta_info: ::id NW_AFP_ENG_0024_2006_0217.27 ::date 2017-11-04T01:09:25 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt Provincial board member Eva Dumol said in a radio interview that heavy equipment that was already in the area to clear up earlier landslides was being sent to the Guinasaugon area. # ::save-date Thu Dec 14, 2017 ::file NW_AFP_ENG_0024_2006_0217_27.txt
sentence: Provincial board member Eva Dumol said in a radio interview that heavy equipment that was already in the area to clear up earlier landslides was being sent to the Guinasaugon area.

meta_info: ::id NW_AFP_ENG_0024_2006_0217.28 ::date 2017-11-04T01:09:42 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt More than 5,000 people were killed in a combined flood and mudslide on Leyte in November 1991. # ::save-date Sat Nov 4, 2017 ::file NW_AFP_ENG_0024_2006_0217_28.txt
sentence: More than 5,000 people were killed in a combined flood and mudslide on Leyte in November 1991.
